biotools.summary: Predicting the effect of mutations on protein-RNA binding with Deep Learning | This repository contains all DeepCLIP Python code | A context-aware neural network for modeling and predicting protein binding to nucleic acids using only sequence input | DeepCLIP is a neural network with shallow convolutional layers connected to a bidirectional LSTM layer
